Description:
JOB REQUIREMENTSEngineering graduate (BSEE preferred) with >15 years of relevant experience in chemical engineering or similar.
Demonstrated “hands-on” experience in designing and maintaining quality assurance on process systems in manufacturing plants.
Proficiency in creating, checking and validating process engineering calculations. Required experience in steam system process knowledge and gas systems and chemical composition understanding.
Understanding of field instrumentation, analyzers, and control valve application requirements.
A fundamental understanding of process plant interfaces for a IGCC.
Understanding of the fields of advanced process control, process simulation (static and dynamic models), real-time optimization, model predictive control, digital control signal engineering and artificial intelligence (machine learning and neural networks).
Solid understanding of fundamentals of chemical process and reaction engineering and thermodynamics.
Candidates should also possess demonstrated math, analytical, trouble-shooting and problem-solving skills, an ability to think logically and systematically. 
Knowledge & understanding with the principle uses of: Functional Safety, Emergency Shut Down System (ESD), Supervisory control and data acquisition (SCADA), Distributed Control System (DCS) and familiar with Abnormal Situation Response (ASR) trip methods.
Knowledge of industry codes and standards applicable to Oil and Gas and Refining Industries (API, ISA, NEC / IEC, NFPA, ASME, etc.) and preferably also Saudi Aramco standards and working practices will be an advantage.
Emphasis placed on safety, teamwork, and aptitude toward challenging work. Skills related to outage planning, organization and communication are highly desirable.
Proficiency in English speaking and writing.
Good interpersonal and teamwork skills with the ability to communicate clearly and effectively throughout all levels within the organization.
Experience in leading and guiding Process Control Teams and service providers.
Knowledge and understanding of local statutory / regulatory requirements would be beneficial.Job Details
